item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Clusters maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 30, 21:00 - 23:00 UTC

Sep 30, 14:58 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect on configuration tasks.

Start time : 30/10/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 30/10/2025 23:00 UTC
Service impact : configuration tasks on clusters may experience slowness due to this maintenance :
https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/z9rbmtrps5bs
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our clusters.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Sharedsql incident notification
item.description:
Oct 4, 19:32 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting has been resolved.

Start time : 04/10/2025 19:13 UTC
End time : 04/10/2025 19:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 4, 19:25 UTC
Identified - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue for sharedsql027.eu013.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 04/10/2025 19:13 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Sharedsql027.eu013 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their databases.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - MX Plan incident notification
item.description:
Oct 3, 13:58 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions has been resolved.

Start time : 03/10/2025 08:15 UTC
End time : 03/10/2025 12:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 3, 10:12 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Collaborative solutions offering, which is causing temporary latencies issue.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 03/10/2025 08:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Slowness was detected on sending some mails.
Customers Impact : customer are experiencing some slowness for email sending and may also be encountering login errors
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
